input.sentences: although i 'd love to say otherwise | [male] was not the most beautiful city .
people tried -- -the painted areas along the streets were colorful | but the smog always hung in the air .
it was a very industrial place | and nothing could disguise that .
it seemed like there was always a lot of vacant lots being half turned into something else | in the ugliest way possible .
i never figured out what half the strange little buildings were ever for .
output.sentences: My male cousin invited me to visit the city we grew up in as children and had loved very much.
The area seemed smoggier and the streets seemed more crowded with buildings and people than I remembered.
The industrial part of the city was disguised in part by wreaths of smog.
Also we saw numerous ugly, vacant lots, some seemed deserted, while others were under construction.
One odd, modern building appeared half realized, strange and we figured it was some architect's vision of the future.
